item.title: [Help]~Member items!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:


public int[] membersItems = {4151, 4153, 6570}; //Add more members items here.
public boolean isMembersItem(int item) {
   for (int i : membersItems) {
      if (i == item) return true;
   }
   return false;
}
if (isMembersItem(wearID)) && !playerIsMember) {
   sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item.");
}

public int[] membersItems = {4151, 4153, 6570}; //Add more members items here.
public boolean isMembersItem(int item) {
for (int i : membersItems) {
if (membersItems[i] == item) return true;
}
return false;
}

sendMessage(“You need to be a member to equip this item.”);
